channel.title: HuffPost - Breaking News, U.S. and World News
channel.description: Read the latest headlines, news stories, and opinion from Politics, Entertainment, Life, Perspectives, and more.

item.title: Oklahoma House Sends Texas-Style Abortion Ban To Governor
Biden Seeks Another $33 Billion To Help Ukraine Fend Off Russia
item.description: President Joe Biden will ask Congress for an additional aid package that includes military assistance and bolstering defenses of nearby countries.
item.content: President Joe Biden will ask Congress for an additional aid package that includes military assistance and bolstering defenses of nearby countries.

item.title: Key U.N. Players Urge Accountability For Atrocities In Ukraine
item.description: The session included the ICC's chief prosecutor, the chair of the U.N. Commission of Inquiry, Ukraine’s top prosecutor and human rights lawyer Amal Clooney.
item.content: The session included the ICC's chief prosecutor, the chair of the U.N. Commission of Inquiry, Ukraine’s top prosecutor and human rights lawyer Amal Clooney.

item.title: Former CIA Chief Warns Of Putin’s Next Move In Ukraine
item.description: The Russian president knows his invasion plan has "completely collapsed," said former intelligence chief John Brennan.
item.content: The Russian president knows his invasion plan has "completely collapsed," said former intelligence chief John Brennan.

item.title: Russian Cyberattacks Aimed To Destroy Critical Infrastructure ― And Steal Data
item.description: The hacks, paired with prewar data theft, likely armed Russia with extensive details on much of Ukraine’s population.
item.content: The hacks, paired with prewar data theft, likely armed Russia with extensive details on much of Ukraine’s population.

item.title: Cat Separated From Owner By Ukraine Invasion Reunites With Family In U.S.
item.description: “I want to express special gratitude to the people who took part in saving my cat from the war in Ukraine,” said Persik’s owner.
item.content: “I want to express special gratitude to the people who took part in saving my cat from the war in Ukraine,” said Persik’s owner.

item.title: Biden Promises Answer On Student Loan Debt Soon
item.description: The president said he is not canceling $50,000 in debt, but a decision would come in a “couple of weeks.”
item.content: The president said he is not canceling $50,000 in debt, but a decision would come in a “couple of weeks.”

item.title: Proud Boy Pleads Guilty In Capitol Attack, Will Cooperate With Prosecutors
item.description: Louis Enrique Colon, 45, faces up to five years in prison for his role in the insurrection.
item.content: Louis Enrique Colon, 45, faces up to five years in prison for his role in the insurrection.

item.title: NASA Astronaut Jessica Watkins To Become First Black Woman To Spend Months In Space
item.description: "I think it really is just a tribute to the legacy of the Black women astronauts that have come before me, as well as to the exciting future ahead," Watkins said.
item.content: "I think it really is just a tribute to the legacy of the Black women astronauts that have come before me, as well as to the exciting future ahead," Watkins said.

item.title: Pregnancy From Rape Is ‘An Opportunity’ For Women, Says Republican Trying To Ban Abortion
item.description: Ohio state Rep. Jean Schmidt (R) defended her abortion ban recently, arguing that "just because you have emotional scars doesn’t give you the right to take a life.”
item.content: Ohio state Rep. Jean Schmidt (R) defended her abortion ban recently, arguing that "just because you have emotional scars doesn’t give you the right to take a life.”

item.title: Derek Chauvin Appeals Murder Conviction For Killing George Floyd
